EmailTemplate.subject: CRITICAL Work Order {!Order.OrderNumber} - 12 hours since moved to 01 - Waiting for Payment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Phunions,
THIS WORK ORDER IS MARKED AS CRITICAL.
It's been 12 hours since Invoice {!Order.Invoice_Number__c} was sent to the customer and we haven't received payment. Please follow up with {!Order.WOAccountLink__c} immediately. Delays in payment will delay the order and may cause the due date to not be met.
{!Order.WONameLink__c}
Thanks,
Ralph the Rooster
